job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Healthcare is going through an unprecedented transformation towards digital care and Medallion provides critical administrative infrastructure to make that possible Our platform enables organizations to license their providers in new states verify existing credentials and get innetwork with insurance payers In less than a year weve launched our platform built an allstar team powered dozens of great companies and served thousands of healthcare providers across the industrybrbrThe heart of Medallions success lies in bringing modern technology and automation to the archaic world of healthcare administration Our web platform and API provide a robust and dare we say delightful abstraction over hundreds of healthcare systems processes and protocols from medical and insurance bodies across the US This abstraction is brought to life by a suite of data integrations web crawlers and backend intelligence that turns crucial but complicated manual processes into automated turnkey solutions critical to the growth of our customersbrbrMedallion is built by a small distributed team of seasoned productminded engineers with decades of experience across startups and public companies alike We pride ourselves on our level of product ownership we dont have a PM yet respect and trust for each other and an ability to execute extremely fast on new ideasbrbrWeve raised 20M from some of the best investors like Spark Capital Optum Ventures Elad Gil Peter Reinhardt and many othersbrbrstrongResponsibilitiesbrstrongulliCollaborate with other engineers to build core infrastructure and features develop web apps write backend services organize data stores orchestrate cloud tools and moreliliWork with internal and external stakeholders to discover and design new product featuresliliParticipate in and influence sprint planning roadmap development and other team processesliliHelp build an awesome company brbrliulstrongRequirementsbrstrongulli2 years of experience working on software teamsliliProficiency with a generalpurpose backend language  Python Go Ruby Java etcliliComfort with backend systems  web applications databases cloud infrastructure etcliliComfort with Javascript or an appetite to learnliliA desire for ownership impact and growthbrbrliul
